## Example rest curl command:

### create identity
```curl
curl -X POST http://restapi.localho.st/create \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "X-User-Cert: " \
  -H "X-User-Key: " \
  -H "X-User-MSPID: Org1MSP" \
  -d '{
    "id": "org1-124",
    "firstName": "xyz",
    "lastName": "ert",
    "phone": "01155588446",
    "nationalID": "101010101"
  }' 
```  
### update identity
```curl
curl -X POST http://restapi.localho.st/update \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "X-User-Cert: " \
  -H "X-User-Key: " \
  -H "X-User-MSPID: Org1MSP" \
  -d '{
    "id": "org1-124",
    "phone": "01111188559",
    "email": "sagor@example.com",
    "dob": "1990-01-01",
    "presentAddress": "123 Main St",
    "permanentAddress": "456 Oak St",
    "gender": "Male"
  }'  
``` 
### delete identity
```curl  
curl -X POST http://restapi.localho.st/delete \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "X-User-Cert: " \
  -H "X-User-Key: " \
  -H "X-User-MSPID: Org1MSP" \
  -d '{"id": "org1-121"}'  
```
### get identity
```curl
curl -X GET http://restapi.localho.st/get/org1-124 \
  -H "X-User-Cert: " \
  -H "X-User-Key: " \
  -H "X-User-MSPID: Org1MSP"
```
